Package main.body

Class Player

java.lang.Object
main.body.Person
main.body.Player
public class Player extends Person
This class implements the Players the are in the Teams in the game. Extends the Person class.

    • Player

      public Player(String name, String rarity, int value, String nickname, int[] stats, AvailablePositions position)
      The constructor for the Player object.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Player.
      rarity - The rarity of the Plater.
      value - The value of the Player.
      nickname - The nickname of the Player.
      stats - The statistics of the player of of 100 in order [passing, tackling, shooting].
      position - The position that the Player plays in.

    • setStamina

      public void setStamina(int stamina)
      Sets the stamina of the player. If it is equal to or below 0 it is set to zero and the player is injured.
      Parameters:
      stamina - The stamina value to give to the player.

    • incStamina
